> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> Nighlight looked  at Rodimus and said "Yes I'm here..." she looked sadly at
> Elita's portrait and folded her wings around her as if she were looking for
> confort. She looked tired and sad and with low voice said "Will you allow
> them reprogram me? Do you think that they will attempt to do it?"

<NEW>

As NIGHTLIGHT asked the questions DARK RODIMUS was also looking at the
picture, but as he turned to face her there was a mixture of emotions
on his face, fear, pride, hurt and sorrow and even anger.

"I don't know." he said finally as he turned away from her, as if
there was something about her that he couln't face yet.

He was about to say something else when his comlink buzzed.

"What!" He said, his voice all anger now as he had somehting to focus
on instead of NIGHTLIGHT.

There was a pause and then the reply, "Report to the bridge - alone."

"Understood." DARK RODIMUS said as he looked at NIGHTLIGHT. Once the
link closed RODIMUS said simply, "Stay here." as he turned to leave
the room.

(TAG)

Preston
